QuestData.Title: The Art of War
QuestData.Description: Lok'tar ogar, $r. I am Nazgrim.$b$bYou are hereby ordered to present yourself at Grommash Hold immediately.$b$bAll in service to the Horde are to swear an oath of allegiance to their new Warchief.$b$bDo not keep him waiting, $r.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to General Nazgrim in Grommash Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: Ahh, good. You're here. And not a moment too soon...
